meaningMnemonic: Oh wow, that is <kanji>exceptional</kanji>ly <kanji>showy</kanji>! Whatever that thing is, it is <vocabulary>luxurious</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>splendid</vocabulary> and I want one.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
